import { Component, OnDestroy, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { Subscription } from "rxjs"; import { AuthService } from "../auth/auth.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-header", templateUrl: "./header.component.html", styleUrls: ["./header.component.scss"], }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { private authListenerSubs: Subscription; public userIsAuthenticated = false; constructor(private authService: AuthService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.authListenerSubs = this.authService .getAuthStatusListener() .subscribe((isAuthenticated) => { this.userIsAuthenticated = isAuthenticated; }); } onLogout() {} ngOnDestroy(): void {} }
